column1: #text=One day , a friend and I decided to bake a cake .
#text=We first looked up ingredients online to make the type of cake we wanted .
#text=Then we went to the supermarket and bought all of them .
#text=After bringing all of our ingredients home , we followed the recipe instructions closely to ensure we were not doing anything wrong .
#text=We put our ingredients together to make sure they were at the right temperature , preheated the oven , and pulled out the proper utensils .
#text=We then prepared the batter using eggs and some other materials we purchased and then poured them into a pan .
#text=We then put the pan in the oven and baked it according to the instructions .
#text=After baking the cake in the oven for the time the recipe told us too , we then double checked to make sure it was done by pushing a knife into the center .
#text=We saw some crumbs sticking to the knife when we pulled it out so we knew it was ready to eat !
